ai-iti79:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti79:2.1_0: “These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by three?
ai-iti79:2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant relishes work,
ai-iti79:2.4_0: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:2.5_0: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They’re dedicated to.
ai-iti79:2.6_0: These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:3.1_0: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:3.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by three?
ai-iti79:3.3_0: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t relish work,
ai-iti79:3.4_0: They don’t relish, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:3.5_0: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors.
ai-iti79:3.6_0: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-iti79:5.1_0: That’s why one ought have few duties,
ai-iti79:6.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
